mapper.select: SELECT ID ,USER_ID ,ARTICLE_ID ,VIDEO_ID FROM MATCH_HISTORY WHERE RANK = ( SELECT MAX(RANK) FROM MATCH_HISTORY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId} )

SELECT VIDEO_ID FROM YOUTUBE_ITEM YI WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM MATCH_HISTORY MH WHERE YI.ARTICLE_ID = MH.ARTICLE_ID AND YI.VIDEO_ID = MH.VIDEO_ID AND MH.USER_ID = #{userId} AND MH.ARTICLE_ID = #{articleId} )
